Detailed Description

Interface for sending Requests, Packets, and PacketContainers.

virtual void Requester::putRequest (  vector< PacketContainer * > &  packets  )  [pure virtual]
 

Send a number of packets and returns the replies.

Parameters:
packets When the function is called the vector should contain all the packets to send. When the function returns it will cotain all the returned packages.

Implemented in BasicMapRequester, BasicRequester, and ParserThread.

virtual void Requester::putRequest (  vector< PacketContainer * > &  reqs,
vector< PacketContainer * > &  reps
)  [pure virtual]
 

Sends a number of packets and returns the replies.

Parameters:
reqs The packets to send, is cleared as packets are consumed.
reps The reply packets, is the same size as reqs was.

Implemented in BasicMapRequester, BasicRequester, and ParserThread.

Returns:
The answer PacketContainer, may be NULL.
